section.title: NCC/NetAct prerequisites
section.p: This section provides information about the parameters that must be configured before NCC/NetAct integration can be successful. Most of these parameters should be configured as part of the NCC Instantiation/Installation. See the NCC Installation and Upgrade Guide for more information about each parameter listed. If the configuration of any of these parameters was missed during NCC Instantiation/Installation, contact Nokia Support to provide the appropriate configuration.
The following fault management configurations must be correctly set for NCC and NetAct integration:

li.p: See in this chapter for more information.

section.p: The following performance measurement configurations must be correctly set for NCC and NetAct integration:

li.p: See in this chapter for more information.
